titles.title: A resolution concurring in the Senate Amendment to H.R. 4833 with an amendment.

action.text: Called up by House Under Suspension of Rules.
Resolution Agreed to in House (Amended) by Voice Vote.

bill.summary: 10/5/1988--Introduced. Provides for taking from the Speaker's table H.R. 4833 (nursing education), with the Senate amendment thereto, and concurring in the Senate amendment with an amendment.
